name: Motorcity Magnets (set of 4)
description:
These tumbled marble magnets make a great gift for yourself or someone you love. Each magnet is handmade with a 2"x2" piece of tumbled marble, and feature iconic Detroit photography. A strong magnet attached on the backside allow these to stick to any magnetic surface. Be sure to collect them all. 

+ Detroit Landmark photography

+ Durable tumbled Marble

+ Water resistant finish that wipes clean

+ Sticks to any magnetic surface

+ Makes a great gift

Since each magnet is handmade with natural stone there may be some variance between the magnets. These variances add to the uniqueness of this product. 

Please choose which 4 magnets you would like for your set. They are lettered in the second photo and in the description below. You can pick four different, four the same, or any combination you desire.

A. Historic Michigan Central Station
B. Detroit Manhole Cover
C. Renaissance Center Line Drawing

E. Famous Fox Theatre
F. Spirit of Detroit
G. Hockeytown
H. Joe Louis Memorial (The Fist)
I. American Coney Island Sign

K. Vernors Wall Mural

M. Comerica Park Sign
N. Detroit Tiger Wall Tile
Q. Entryway to Comerica Park
R. State Theatre Sign

name: Motorcity Coasters (set of 4)
description:
Show off your love of Detroit with these high quality tumbled marble drink coasters.  Each handmade coaster features iconic photos from around the Detroit area.  These durable coasters are ready to accept the most demanding drink, and with proper care should last a lifetime.  Each coaster features a corked bottom for your furniture's pleasure.  

+ Detroit Landmark photography

+ Durable tumbled Marble

+ Water resistant finish that   wipes clean

+ Corked bottom to help protect   furniture surfaces

+ Makes a great gift

Since each coaster is handmade with natural stone there may be some variance between the coasters.  These variances add to the uniqueness of this product.  Coasters are not dishwasher safe, and should just be wiped clean with a damp cloth if needed.

Please choose which 4 coasters you would like for your set.  They are lettered in the photos and in the description below.  You can pick four different, four the same, or any combination you desire.

A.  Historic Michigan Central Station
B.  Detroit Manhole Cover
C.  Renaissance Center Line Drawing

E.  Famous Fox Theatre
F.  Spirit of Detroit
G.  Hockeytown
H.  Joe Louis Memorial (The Fist)
I.    American Coney Island Sign

K.  Vernors Wall Mural

M.  Comerica Park Sign
N.  Detroit Tiger Wall Tile
P.  Spirit of Detroit in Tigers Jersey
Q.  Entryway to Comerica Park
R.  State Theatre Sign
S.  University of Michigan Medallion from Michigan Field
